data.title: Ideal Empires and Republics
data.meta_description: A collection of 4 of the best known works about utopias: Rousseau’s Social Contract, More’s Utopia, Bacon’s New Atlantis, and Campanella’s City of the Sun.
data.text:
Sir Francis Bacon (author)

Tommaso Campanella (author)

Sir Thomas More (author)

Jean-Jacques Rousseau (author)

Charles M. Andrews (introduction)

A collection of 4 of the best known works about utopias: Rousseau’s Social Contract, More’s Utopia, Bacon’s New Atlantis, and Campanella’s City of the Sun.

Citation
